COI!

This is the INFO of my blog.

I was a student studying astrophysics, cosmology. I am learning Sanskrit, so as to read Gita.

I’m a linux user. I also use a lisp-like language, Mathematica. I am learning HTML/CSS/JS.

I usually write blogs in Chinese, but sometimes in English.
